properties.entry:
SELECT FILE_NO, COURSE, BRANCH, SEMESTER, FEE_GENERATED
FROM studentfeestaging where FILE_NO=:FILE_NO;

Insert into studentfeestaging
(FILE_NO, COURSE, BRANCH, SEMESTER, FEE_GENERATED ) values
(:FILE_NO, :COURSE, :BRANCH, :SEMESTER, :FEE_GENERATED )
SELECT COURSE, BRANCH, SEMESTER, FEE_HEAD_ID, FEE_AMOUNT FROM feedetailmaster where FEE_HEAD_ID=:FEE_HEAD_ID AND COURSE=:COURSE AND BRANCH=:BRANCH ;

Insert into feedetailmaster
(COURSE, BRANCH, SEMESTER, FEE_HEAD_ID, FEE_AMOUNT) values
(:COURSE, :BRANCH, :SEMESTER, :FEE_HEAD_ID, :FEE_AMOUNT)
Delete from feedetailmaster where FEE_HEAD_ID=:FEE_HEAD_ID AND COURSE=:COURSE AND BRANCH=:BRANCH;

SELECT FEE_ID, DATE, USER, AMOUNT, AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_TYPE, File_no
FROM feetransaction where File_no=:File_no ;

Insert into feetransaction
( FEE_ID, DATE, USER, AMOUNT, AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_TYPE, File_no ) values
( :FEE_ID, :DATE, :USER, :AMOUNT, :AMOUNT_TRANSACTION_TYPE, :File_no )
